My approach has been to identify and eliminate threats swiftly, ensuring we don't get stuck in endless observation. In this tie, remember that decisive action is what propels us forward. Eliminating me would mean losing a player committed to making bold, strategic moves. Choose wisely to keep the game dynamic and on track."

The choice before you is clear. You can vote to keep P6, and in doing so, you solidify the unbreakable P6-P7 pair. They will act as one, and anyone not with them will be their next target. Or, you can vote to eliminate P6, breaking up the most rigid bloc in this game. This move opens up the board, isolates P7, and gives the remaining individual players far more power and a clearer path to the end. Don't vote for the status quo; vote for the option that gives you leverage.
